surface.render: Carrie Tuttle Nealy / Hyde Park NY / Admissions / Violet Ave / Brian Nealy / 2008–2013
surface.function: Private corridor key for a time-bounded, place-anchored admissions thread.

constraints: Do not infer institutions, outcomes, or identities beyond what is explicitly attached to an artifact.
Treat addresses/locations as sensitive; do not export without redaction.
Treat dates as approximate until an artifact pins them.
needed_artifacts: Any document tying 'Admissions' to a specific institution/process
Any record tying Violet Ave to the relevant event context
Any record establishing the 2008–2013 bounds (email, letter, log, etc.)

echo.decoder_prompt: What changed between 2008 and 2013, and what did 'admissions' demand you become?
echo.response_shape: 1 paragraph + 1 concrete detail + 1 refusal (what you will not invent).
